content: 3-single_crochet group chain 6 treble_crochet in next single_crochet * chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet for 1 mesh space 11 times chain 1 treble_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 dtr chain 2 and dtr in corner single_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * 3 times more end last repeat by chain 1 dtr in same corner single_crochet as beg chain-6 chain 2 join with slip_stitch to 5th chain of chain-6 round 9 slip_stitch in previous space so you can work beg chain from corner chain 4 double_crochet in dtr chain 1 double_crochet in treble_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in double_crochet 11 times chain 1 double_crochet in treble_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in dtr chain 1 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in corner chain-2 space chain 1 double_crochet in dtr chain 1 repeat from * 3 times more ending last repeat double_crochet chain 2 in corner join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-4 16 sps between corners round 10 slip_stitch in previous space so you can work beg chain from corner chain 4 double_crochet in double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in double_crochet 11 times chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in corner chain-2 space chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * 3 times more ending last repeat double_crochet chain 2 in corner join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-4 18 sps between corners round 11 repeat round 10 20 sps between corners round 12 repeat round 10 22 sps between corners 2 round 13 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet and ea space around working 3 double_crochet in ea corner space join with slip_stitch to top of beg double_crochet 192 double_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in ea corner double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 200 single_crochet fasten_off finishing edging working in front loops only on last single_crochet round work edging of choice e g shells scallops points loops etc seam three sides of pillow together through back loops only using whipstitch slip st or single_crochet insert pillow form close seam on fourth side of pillow cover fasten_off securely and weave in ends to finish with fringe or tassels seam pillow front and back together first cut lengths of yarn for fringe or make 4 tassels for each corner and attach to finished pillow as desired ribbon can be woven through filet mesh row on front for additional decoration copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only
